content.user_title: Create Viral X Posts and Threads
content.value_statement: Content creators struggle to consistently produce engaging social media posts. This skill generates viral X (Twitter) content including short tweets, multi-tweet threads, and replies using proven patterns tailored to your personal style.
actual_capabilities: Generate short tweets under 280 characters with high engagement potential
Create multi-tweet threads (3-10 tweets) with sequential storytelling
Write reply posts for trending topics using your established style
Apply 5 proven post patterns: high-value, sharp opinion, trending comment, story insight, and tech analysis
Learn your writing style from reference posts for consistent voice
Suggest optimal posting times and engagement predictions
limitations: Does not actually post to X - generates content for you to publish manually
Does not access trending topics or current news feeds
Requires initial onboarding to understand your preferences
May not capture very niche or highly technical vocabulary specific to your field

best_practices: Provide reference posts from accounts you admire so the skill can learn your preferred tone and structure
Complete the initial onboarding with accurate details about your target audience and content goals
Iterate on outputs - refine topics and adjust style preferences for better results over time
anti_patterns: Do not expect the skill to know current events or trending topics - provide context yourself
Avoid leaving onboarding incomplete - the skill needs your profile to generate relevant content
Do not rely on this for real-time news commentary without providing the news context first

faq.question: Does x-create actually post to my X account?
faq.answer: No. x-create generates content for you to review and publish. It does not have access to the X API for posting.

faq.question: How does the skill learn my writing style?
faq.answer: Place example posts you like in assets/templates/{category}/ folder. The skill reads these to understand your preferred tone, structure, and vocabulary.

faq.question: What are the 5 post types supported?
faq.answer: High-value (educational), Sharp opinion (controversial takes), Trending comment (news response), Story insight (personal experience), and Tech analysis (deep dives).

faq.question: Can I use this skill for languages other than English?
faq.answer: Yes. Set your preferred language during onboarding. The skill works with Chinese, English, or bilingual content.

faq.question: How long should my thread be?
faq.answer: Threads typically range from 3 to 10 tweets. Shorter threads (3-5) work for quick tips. Longer threads (6-10) suit detailed analyses.

faq.question: What if I do not have reference posts to share?
faq.answer: The skill includes default patterns in references/post-patterns.md. These are proven viral templates you can use directly.
